explains: n. 重新评估；[经] 重新估价；重新考虑

sentences.en: There's a total reassessment of what people want out of life.
sentences.cn: 对于人们对生活有什么样的期待有了重新评价。

sentences.en: It is almost certain to argue that a wholescale reassessment is unnecessary.
sentences.cn: 这几乎可以确切表明，全方位的再评估是不必要的。

sentences.en: The doner killers may force a reassessment.
sentences.cn: 烤肉杀手们或将推动一场重新评估。
